name: Teachmeaboutmarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome and thank you for taking a look at this skill! 

In this skill you can expect short audio marketing tips for Alexa Users only. You can implement the effective strategies I am going to share with you in your business. 

This skill is value-packed, actionable, and easy to understand episodes ranging around the 1 to 3 minutes. 

Hosted by digital marketing specialist, Justin Larson, young business owner. 

I got into marketing because I started working for my parents at a young age helping them post machinery and lumber products online to help them sell and reach to more people. 

As I grew older I knew that’s what I wanted to do with my life, help businesses grow their business I love the fact that I can help grow a business online no matter what the business is doing. 

I named my company Green Forest Marketing because it resembles what my parents sold and because of my philosophy on marketing. It’s about planting the right seeds and nurturing your business in order to create a harvest that your business will become!

Please send me your questions about the show here
Justin@greenforestmarketing.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
